availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander H. Kininmonth (Butler County, KY, sheriff and farmer)

body.p: Butler County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Virginia native. Son of RobertMarried to Louisa Kininmonth. Father of Margaret Kininmonth, Warren Kininmonth, Silas Kininmonth, and John Kininmonth Farmer in Butler County in 1860. Sheriff of Butler County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Butler County, p. 840.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Butler County, Rochester Precinct No. 3, p.385A.
Find A Grave, "Alexander H. Kininmonth (1824-1878)," Memorial 84852199, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84852199/alexander-h-kininmonth (accessed March 3, 2020).
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 2nd Congressional District, Vol. 3, July 1863, p. 457, (Accessed via ancestry.com on March 3, 2020).
KYR-0001-004-0056.
